name: Word Crush - Challenging Word Puzzle Game
name_original: Word Crush - Challenging Word Puzzle Game
description:
Word Crush is a fun new word finding game! Spell out words by tapping on the letter blocks. Valid words boost your score and the diminishing timer bar. Used letters get crushed and new ones fall in from above. Spell longer words to get letter blocks with special powers like lightning, bomb, and nuke! Exercise your brain and try to beat your own or your friends top scores. PLAY NOW!

***GREAT FOR KIDS AND ADULTS!***
Word Crush features 4 different difficulties: easy, normal, hard, and expert. Kids and adults will find the challenge that's right for them!

***TWO GREAT GAME MODES!***
* Arcade: Find as many words as you can before the timer expires. Boost your score by spelling longer words and using letter blocks with special powers. Chain them together to increase your combo!

* Endless: There is no timer on this mode. It's great for casual game play when you just want to find words and not worry about a timer.

***TAKE ON THE CHALLENGE!***
Try to earn 3 stars for each difficulty. Are you fast and smart enough to win them all?
